name: CyberStream
full_sector_coverage: Telecom, Device Manufacturers, Consumer, Technology, Internet, Media
sectors: Cable/Internet/Satellite, Consumer, Gaming, Internet, Media, Software (SaaS), Telecom, TMT & Entertainment
pricing_structure: We have multiple pricing structures depending on how the data is provided. We offer daily, weekly or monthly aggregated reports, as well as clean raw data delivered as frequent as every hour.
why_us?: Our feedback has been we're the "swiss army knife" of data providers.
advantages: Our data is not collected via web-scrapping or with a browser plugin like our competitors. We collect the data first hand from end users and see trends on an hourly basis before they are reported.
use_cases: Market share of devices and telecoms, device and carrier churn, device sales, international telecoms, etc.
